textContent:
Missing completely at random (MCAR) no relation between missing and other values 

Missing at random (MAR) means the missing value is not related to its own value but is instead related to the values of other variables

Lastly, nonignorable missing data constitutes the absence of data due directly to its own value or significance of the information.
title: Data Scrubbing Operation: Drop Missing Values
textContentHtml:
Missing completely at random (MCAR) no relation between missing and other values 


Missing at random (MAR) means the missing value is not related to its own value but is instead related to the values of other variables


Lastly, nonignorable missing data constitutes the absence of data due directly to its own value or significance of the information.
